entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
